ai-snp4.10:1.2_0: The astute one is at peace.
ai-snp4.10:2.5_0: and has nothing equal to them.
ai-snp4.10:3.4_0: is a sage by speech right speech.
ai-snp4.10:4.1_0: free of hope, in the future,
ai-snp4.10:5.2_0: even if a stingy with bath,
ai-snp4.10:5.3_0: But one who is not sinner, in disgust of sin,
ai-snp4.10:6.4_0: but the faithful don’t become dispassionate.
ai-snp4.10:7.2_0: And you don’t get angry for no reason.
ai-snp4.10:8.2_0: the world is rude down on,
ai-snp4.10:9.4_0: whose craving is not found in them.
ai-snp4.10:10.1_0: I declare you the true teaching!
ai-snp4.10:10.2_0: you’re not concerned for sensual pleasures.
ai-snp4.10:10.3_0: They who hold nothing loved or loathed
ai-snp4.10:11.1_0: you’ll have no sons or cattle,
ai-snp4.10:12.1_0: by which they might be described,
ai-snp4.10:12.4_0: that’s why they lead him down.
ai-snp4.10:13.3_0: They agree with the in their own realm,
ai-snp4.10:14.2_0: who does not grieve for that which is lost.
ai-snp4.10:14.3_0: if she does not go because
ai-snp4.10:14.4_0: is said to be a person.”
